name: @berlinsms/phonenumber-validator
description: jquery-plugin to verify a phonenumber direct in the formular.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && svn commit && git push && npm login && npm publish --access public && npm unpublish @berlinsms/phonenumber-validator@1.0.3 --force
